item.title: #tl @ 1431092533786918915
item.description: Sana tuwing budget delibs sa Kongreso, tuwing may ahensya na gagamit ng "DRR", "climate change", "science", "research", atbp buzzwords, ang unang tanong ay "open data ba yan?" Kasunod siguro ay "open data na ba yung data mula sa nakaraan nyong activities?"

item.description: 1. Open data needs to be regularized in policies with teeth, not a soft norm. 2. It should not be easy to escape scrutiny of your work and especially to use power to do that. 3. Incentives are too aligned with catchy findings and not enough with scientific care. Anyway thanks!
